document_data.name: Great suq
document_data.mainbody: The '''great suq''' was a large marketplace in [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The great suq was made up of a maze of covered passageways and enclosed streets.
document_data.Activities: The variety of goods available for purchase within the great suq rivaled that of the [[Grand Bazaar]] of [[Huzuz]]. Virtually all manner of goods could be found purchased within the great suq, including illegal and forbidden commodities if one was bold enough to venture into the shadows.
